meanings.definition: The quality or state of being somewhat green in color.
meanings.sent1: The greenishness of the leaves in the garden was soothing to the eyes.
meanings.sent2: The artist added a touch of greenishness to the painting to give it a natural look.
meanings.sent3: The greenishness of the smoothie made it look like a healthy potion.
meanings.sent4: The greenishness of envy colored her thoughts and actions.
meanings.sent5: The greenishness of the grass after the rain was vibrant and fresh.

meanings.definition: A slight or moderate green hue or tint.
meanings.sent1: The greenishness of the sky just before a storm was ominous.
meanings.sent2: The greenishness of the dress made it stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The greenishness of the traffic light signaled it was time to stop.
meanings.sent4: The greenishness of the lake reflected the surrounding trees beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The greenishness of the apple indicated it was not yet ripe.
